attributes.action: Pensions for Carers on Carer's Allowance
attributes.additional_details:
Carers who earn a Carer's Allowance, currently £55 per week, should accrue pensions at the same rate and on the same basis as Civil Servants/Public Servants.

Carers are denied the chance to work [and saves the state a fortune], therefore should gain a pension in the same way a civil servant does
